Interests

Apart from being a developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I am an avid runner that often puts close to 100 miles ran a month. I enjoy rock climbing, drone Cinematography, and lacrosse as well.

I listen to a number of technology, true crime, and comedy podcasts. I always appreciate recommendations!

I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in both the front-end and backend development world to refine my full stack capabilities.
